subject: Belmont Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Big Brown will start from the No. 1 hole Saturday at the Belmont Stakes when the colt tries to win the Triple Crown as a 2-5 favorite.
snippet: Big Brown will start from the No. 1 hole Saturday at the Belmont Stakes when the colt tries to win the Triple Crown as a 2-5 favorite.
